title: 820-3462 No image
message:
SMC_LID 3.42
LCD connector looked good and no shorts
PP5...?..SW_LCD 5v
U9701 Pin 23 5v, Pin 3.3v

Recently on 2 820-3332 I replaced U8900 for no image and both are working good now, I am wondering if replacing U7400 wil fix it on this one.

title: 820-3462 No image
message:
Check all C902x caps and their traces.
Also check AUX strapping resistors and all R901x.

40V is OK there.

title: 820-3462 No image
message: All caps and resistors are good and traces fine, not sure what [COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]AUX strapping resistors are.[/FONT][/COLOR]

title: 820-3462 No image
message: The problem is the facetime camera on the LCD or the board, when that cable is disconnected the Mac works just fine, I will be checking out that circuit and see if we can fix it without replacing the screen. If you have any pointers on how to address that please let me know.

Cut off traces from pins 5/6 of J3502.
